<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Ethereal Sailor](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1652)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Ethereal Sailor](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1652)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="No Alignment" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 77</row>

**Perception** +14; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
(understands commands)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15, [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 60

**Immunities**
[disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) attacks, [paralysis](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), precision, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
all damage 10 (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75) or [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297))

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 30 feet

**Force Body**   An ethereal sailor's body is made of force. It can't use attack actions. It can move and use actions necessary to pilot or crew a boat or ship. It can't leave its boat or ship.

</column>
name: Ethereal Sailor
resistance_raw: all damage 10 (except  force  or   ghost touch  )
